description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Zafrani Garam Masala, a premium blend of aromatic spices. This 50g pack delivers rich, warm flavors perfect for curries, meats, and vegetables.  Its unique saffron-infused recipe adds a touch of luxury to any dish.

Key features include a perfectly balanced mix of saffron, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and other select spices.  The 'V-Locked' freshness ensures consistent quality and taste.  This versatile masala is a must-have for both novice and experienced cooks.

Experience the authentic taste of Shan, a trusted brand known for its premium quality spices. Add depth and complexity to your cooking today!  Order now and transform your meals!

Create authentic Korma dishes with Shan Korma Masala, a premium recipe and seasoning mix. This blend of carefully selected spices delivers rich, aromatic flavors, elevating your culinary creations.  It's perfect for both everyday cooking and special occasions.  Enjoy the convenience of pre-measured ingredients for consistently delicious results.

Shan Korma Masala is a 50g pack of pure spices, free from artificial preservatives and additives.  It's designed to easily enhance the taste of meat or vegetable dishes, providing the perfect balance of warmth and depth.  Simply follow the instructions on the pack for optimal results.

Elevate your cooking with the trusted quality of Shan.  This versatile masala is a must-have for any spice enthusiast. Order yours today and experience the authentic taste of home-cooked Korma!

Unleash the rich, aromatic depths of authentic Nihari with SHAN__NIHARI_MASALA!  Experience the tender, melt-in-your-mouth meat and deeply flavorful broth that defines this classic dish.  Our expertly blended spices deliver restaurant-quality Nihari, easily made at home. Save time and impress your family!

This premium blend contains a unique selection of carefully sourced spices, perfectly balanced for an unparalleled Nihari experience.  It's easy to use â€“ simply add to your preferred meat and simmer to perfection.  No artificial colors or flavors.  Makes approximately 4-6 servings.  Perfectly balanced spice profile.

Elevate your culinary skills with SHAN__NIHARI_MASALA.  Enjoy the convenience of a pre-mixed blend without compromising on taste or authenticity. Perfect for special occasions or a comforting weeknight meal. Order yours today and savor the taste of tradition!

Elevate your culinary creations with National Garam Masala Powder, a 50g pack of authentically blended spices. This traditional blend adds warmth and depth to curries, stews, and marinades.  It's the perfect way to infuse your dishes with rich, aromatic flavors. 

Made with a traditional blend of 7 carefully selected spices, including cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, and black pepper, this finely ground powder is incredibly versatile.  Its vibrant color and intense aroma promise a flavorful experience in every bite.  It's freshly ground for maximum potency and flavor.

Add a dash to your favorite recipes or use it as a finishing sprinkle for an extra burst of flavor.  National Garam Masala is a kitchen essential for creating delicious and authentic South Asian cuisine. Order yours today!

Unleash the fiery fury of SHAN__ACHAR_GHOST! This isn't your grandma's pickle; it's a ghost pepper achar explosion of flavor. Experience intense heat balanced by tangy, savory notes. Perfect for adventurous palates seeking a thrilling culinary adventure.  Prepare for a flavor journey unlike any other!


Crafted with premium ghost peppers, vibrant spices, and carefully selected vegetables, this achar boasts an authentic, handcrafted taste.  Each jar is packed with generous chunks of deliciousness.  Enjoy its bold, complex profile as a condiment, appetizer, or spicy kick to your favorite dishes.  


Spice up your life!  SHAN__ACHAR_GHOST adds a unique, unforgettable zest to any meal. Try it with samosas, naan bread, or even eggs for a fiery breakfast.  Order yours today and experience the ultimate ghost pepper achar!

Elevate your chaat and snacks with Shan Chaat Masala, a vibrant blend of spices that delivers a tangy and flavorful kick.  This 100g pack is perfect for adding a delicious zest to your favorite dishes, from savory snacks to refreshing salads. 

Our expertly crafted mix contains a unique combination of premium spices, creating a balanced and aromatic seasoning.  It's ideal for garnishing chaat, adding depth to curries, or enhancing the flavor of vegetables and meats.  It's 100% vegetarian.

Spice up your culinary creations with Shan's authentic Chaat Masala.  Use it generously to bring a burst of flavor to your dishes. Order now and experience the difference!

Create delicious Seekh Kababs with Shan's authentic Seekh Kabab Masala! This 50g pack provides a flavorful blend of spices, perfectly balancing traditional tastes for an exclusive BBQ experience.  Simply follow the easy instructions for juicy, tender kebabs every time.

This premium seasoning mix is expertly crafted with a unique combination of high-quality spices. It's vegetarian-friendly and designed to enhance the natural flavors of your meat.  The convenient 50g size is ideal for multiple uses.

Elevate your grilling game with Shan's Seekh Kabab Masala.  Impress your friends and family with restaurant-quality kebabs, made easily at home! Order yours today and experience the difference.

Enhance your cooking with National Pure Garlic Powder! This 50g pack delivers a strong, fresh garlic aroma and flavor to all your dishes.  Made with freshly ground garlic, it's perfect for adding a savory punch to soups, stews, marinades, and more. 

Our pure garlic powder is free from artificial additives, ensuring a natural taste. Its convenient packaging makes it easy to store and use.  Each sprinkle adds a burst of intense garlic flavor. The finely ground texture blends seamlessly into any recipe. 

Elevate your culinary creations with the authentic taste of National Pure Garlic Powder.  Order yours today and experience the difference!
